entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -28.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
